meanings.definition: To a great extent or degree
meanings.sent2: He greatly improved his grades with hard work.
meanings.sent3: The cat greatly surprised the dog by jumping out from behind the couch.
meanings.sent4: His kindness greatly warmed her heart.
meanings.sent5: The storm greatly shook the entire town with its fierce winds.

meanings.definition: In a great manner or way
meanings.sent1: She sings greatly during music class.
meanings.sent2: He runs greatly faster than his friends.
meanings.sent3: The clown's performance greatly amused the children at the party.
meanings.sent4: The news of the victory greatly lifted everyone's spirits.
meanings.sent5: The mountain stood greatly against the backdrop of the setting sun.
